short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fancy text generator / font changer. Converts your normal text into fancy fonts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple fancy text generator that requires no browser permissions. Simply click the extension icon and type some text, and then you can easily copy-paste the generated fancy fonts into your social media posts without leaving the page.
